data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Eardley, Connal, Griswold, Terry (2018): Taxonomic revision of Cyphanthidium Pasteels (Hymenoptera: Apoidea: Megachilidae: Megachilinae: Anthidiini), an endemic Afrotropical bee genus. Zootaxa 4450 (1), DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4450.1.2|6 occurrences
